title: Fructose and processed food
content: In this episode, Dr. Robert Lustig discusses the dangers of fructose and processed food. He explains how fructose is metabolized differently than glucose and can lead to non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD) and other health problems. He also discusses how processed food is designed to be addictive and can lead to overconsumption and obesity.

title: Changing the food system
content: Dr. Lustig also talks about the challenges of changing the food system, particularly when 10 companies control almost 90 percent of the calories consumed in the US. He suggests that government intervention and regulation may be necessary to improve the food environment and promote healthier eating habits.
